Package unitControlModule.stateFactories.goals

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    UnitGoalStateDefault
    SimpleUnitGoalState.java --- A simple GoalState for a Unit containing all basic states.
    UnitGoalStateProtect
    UnitGoalStateProtect.java --- GoalState containing goals regarding the protection of the Player's own Units.
    UnitGoalStateStealth
    UnitGoalStateStealth.java --- GoalState containing goals regarding different stealth aspects of the Game like i.e. cloaking.
    UnitGoalStateTerran_SCV
    UnitGoalStateTerran_SCV.java --- A GoalState for a Terran_SCV.
    UnitGoalStateWorker
    UnitGoalStateWorker.java --- A simple GoalState for a worker Unit.
